website_summaries.verdict: The Ultrathin Keyboard Cover for iPad Air isn't quite as ultrathin-feeling as the original iPad cover, but it's still an excellent -- if feature-minimal -- Bluetooth keyboard accessory.
pros: The Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard Cover for iPad Air has an excellent, uncompromising keyboard and solid build quality, and it packs flat
cons: Lacks advanced case features like automatic Bluetooth pairing or multiple viewing angles
doesn't protect back of your iPad

customer_reviews.title: There is No Battery
customer_reviews.text: The only way this keyboard will work is if it is plugged into an electric outlet. I charged overnight and got zero charge. Coming out of the box the light indicated a full charge, but would never work. There are a bunch of these on the market. Beware. This may be specific to the iPad (5th Gen) not the Air. I have no idea why it works flawlessly when plugged in, but won't operate on battery, won't even pair. ???? Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Barry D Estell

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using the keyboard cover for a few days but I'm quite impressed. It's thin, light and really looks great. I'm not a fast typist but the keyboard feels as good as my hi-end Lenovo laptop. I think the iPad/Logitech combination will be fine for travel. I really like the fact that you can easily separate the iPod from the keyboard cover if you are just reading and don't need to type anything. The Bluetooth setup was almost too easy. Go to Bluetooth settings press the Bluetooth button on the keyboard and select the Logitech keyboard on the iPad and it works! No ID numbers or pairing that often make Bluetooth setup painful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meran

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Update: I recently replaced my iPad Air 1 (2013) with the new iPad 6th generation (2018) and this keyboard works perfectly with it. The 6th generation iPad is the same size as the iPad Air 1 (I think the Air 2 was thinner). Awesome product! Turned my iPad into a little laptop. Would be nice if the charging cord was longer (it’s only about a foot long). It attaches to the iPad with a really stong magnet and they fold together like a laptop. The keyboard can hold the iPad in portrait orientation but it’s not as stable as the horizontal position.
customer_reviews.author: LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my new Air 2, and because ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new Air 2, and because the new device is a touch thinner than the original Air, the angle of the Air 2 in the keyboard slot is just a bit too severe. It works, but not as solidly as the original ultrathin with the older iPad. Maybe you all with the Air 2 should wait for Logitech to come out with an ultrathin keyboard specifically engineered for the thinner Air 2.
customer_reviews.author: Bingoprof

customer_reviews.title: great logitech product, I now own two
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Logitech Blue tooth keyboard for iPad ( I got one for my wife and liked it so much I bought the company- I mean I bought myself one) The keyboard is solid and well made and linked up to my iPad with ease. It is comfortable to use and sure beats using the built in GUI keyboard. The fact that this keyboard also doubles as a cover to protect the iPad screen is also a big positive. Absolutely no complaints and highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: GD_amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not the lastest version
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased it from Amazon, I went online with one of their representatives to inquire if this was the newest model? He told me that since they were all new & have just arrived, he said it would be the newest model. WRONG! I really wanted the improved version, but this works well. My primary drawback & something that has been mention by other reviewers is when you close it, the iPad doesn't always turn off. The magnet either isn't strong enough or just not in the right position. Other than this it works well & I really do appreciate it when I'm having to do a lot of typing.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this keypad with the iPad products bar none!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!!! It works great with any apple procuct. I have tried several brands of keypads and this one is the only one I have found that is reliable. It never skips, etc as others do. Thats because of the bluetooth communication with the ipad. 2 of my children have these and they love them too-they have the ipad 2 mini. 1 child has an iPad Pro and it works great with that one too-I wish the keys lit up-BUT they letters tap very quietly and comfortable. So I will take the great with the boo, lol
customer_reviews.author: BW Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The cover was attractive, even elegant, as it mirrored the surface of the iPad Air. Held in place magnetically, it closes to protect the iPad (and keep the iPad turned off when not in use). But the Bluetooth connection was erratic and unreliable. I returned it and purchased elsewhere a Logitech keyboard that comes in a case that one can use as a stand for the iPad. It's battery-driven, not rechargeable through a USB cord like the Ultrathin, and the Bluetooth connection is faultless. You can also keep your iPad in its own think rubber-backed case and still use the convertible keyboard stand/case if you like.
customer_reviews.author: nisquire

customer_reviews.title: great quality feel and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The device works as expected, great quality feel and looks great. I like the strong magnets that hold the keyboard in place so it acts as protection for the screen. The life of the rechargeable battery between charges is great and the Bluetooth connection works very reliably. The keyboard is convenient to type. The keys are well spaced and responsive. The only little issue is that the groove that hold the iPad upright could be a bit deeper. I had several occasions where the iPad slipped out of the groove and fell down on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Merkle

customer_reviews.title: Ok.  Very good functionality, poor durablity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boss. He is hard on his electronics, but the keyboard "broke" in the first month of having it. By "broke" the plastic clips snapped off when he "placed" the iPad in the car. I had to utilize some tape, glue, and a paper clip to get the product back together. If your careful I am sure this product will hold up, as his last Logitech Bluetooth keyboard last 3 years. Its great from a functionality point of view, but poor from a durability stand point.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A necessary accessory
customer_reviews.text: I HATE using touchscreen keyboards. There's no tactile sense and it's much slower than using "real" keys. This keyboard attaches magnetically and is a secure protective cover for the iPad Air when not in use. Absolutely no complaints. Does exactly what it's supposed to do, as advertised. The keyboard is, by definition, the size of the iPad, so keys are a little smaller and closer together. However, within a minute, your fingers adapt and you can get back up to your normal typing speed you might use on a full-size keyboard. Your "mouse" is still the touchscreen, since the keyboard would have to be distractingly rearranged to accommodate one, at the expense of key size.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant to buy because of problem reviews-so glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of poor reviews. So glad I went ahead and tried it. I love it! Looks terrific with the white iPad air and the magnet is strong. I don't have any issues with keyboard not sitting in place correctly. Loved it so much my husband purchased a black keyboard to go with his black iPad air. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 3boyz2keep

customer_reviews.title: Responsive Keyboard with Well-spaced, Well-sized Keys, at a Great Price = Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard, it made my ipad as close to a laptop as it could be. The keys are very light to the touch, and they're quite responsive. The keys are large enough and well spaced enough to make it feel like a regular keyboard. I could type for ages without my fingers cramping up or without making stupid errors, as i do when using small keyboards with awkwardly placed/sized keys, I tried a number of keyboards out at Best Buy before buying this one off of Amazon, at such a LOW price to boot! Defintey recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Passive Chef

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best keyboard ever. I had one for my old ipad but couldn't use it with the 5th gen, so this keyboard/cover is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blkpny

customer_reviews.title: A no brainer good thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Love the fact that is slim, lightweight and protects my iPad screen when I am out in the world. Also I don't live in a swank neighborhood--- it's not a terrible one, but a very heavily trafficked one--- but it easily disguises my iPad. My last keyboard was bulky and almost garish so I guess it's lucky my spouse spilled red wine on it and got me this upgrade. Thanks hon!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Works with iPad 6
customer_reviews.text: I recently got an iPad 6 and wanted a keyboard similar to my Logitech keyboard for my iPad 3. Fortunately, this iPad keyboard does indeed fit the iPad 6. I just like how it neatly closes over the screen, had great battery life, and is easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Hope it ends well ...
customer_reviews.text: My first board lasted nearly two years then stopped holding a charge. I recently ordered this second one and after a couple weeks I’m having the same issues. Per the comments and reviews this company isn’t great at customer service. I emailed and am hoping to have another one sent that will hold a charge. Nice keyboard but if it doesn’t work it isn’t worth keeping or buying again.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Seller got the product to me quickly but it did not work...
customer_reviews.text: The seller did a great job getting the keyboard cover to me but after charging for 24 hours it did not work. It works when connected to my computer but as soon as I unplug it, there is no light indicating that it is on. Bluetooth worked but only when plugged in. I am going to return it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory R. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is really thin and adds such a great tool to the Ipad. I especially love the sleekness to it and the way it folds in front of the ipad screen. The magnetic strip that holds the Ipad to the keyboard is strong and allows for an easy quick cover of the screen. The responsiveness is also excellent, the Bluetooth connectivity allows for you to use the keyboard virtually anywhere. The battery is also really good, lasts a long time. I have been using this keyboard for 6 months and had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Denlinger

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality, bowing and cracking after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: While the keyboard itself is very satisfactory for typing the retaining lip (that holds the ipad in place for use) is thin and fragile. When the ipad is inserted it's weight causes the lip to bow upward and the back of the keyboard proper to raise slightly as well as the entire keyboard unit itself ..... all the while making cracking sounds like it's about to break and let the ipad crash down. It just doesn't seem sturdy/rigid enough to support the ipad even in landscape mode and with the ipad in portrait mode the unit is particularly unstable. Not wanting either it to break or it to break my ipad as it breaks I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: The Rarely Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Cover? Does not work as a keyboard and does not cover anything.
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Keyboard Cover does not work as a keyboard and it is useless as a cover. As a keyboard, the spot where you are supposed to rest the Ipad at so you can type DOES NOT HOLD the Ipad Air and the Ipad will fall backwards. The cover? They should be legally allowed to add Cover to the name of the product. There is no cover, the magnets do not hold the "cover" to the Ipad and it covers only 75% of the surface. Do not buy this item. I am returning mine today after it almost broke my Ipad because it kept falling when I was typing.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Newton

customer_reviews.title: It works really well and is easy to connect with your iPad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard for multiple reasons - to use as a keyboard, to protect my iPad Air as a case and to use as a stand when watching movies. It works really well and is easy to connect with your iPad. The keyboard responds well and the keys aren't too small or too big so it makes typing comfortable. I would recommend checking other sites (such as overstock.com) before purchasing as I found it for $10 less right after my product arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Scoopes

customer_reviews.title: Will change the way you use your iPad
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard fundamentally changes the way i use my iPad. I no longer carry my computer with me as this keyboard allows me to get full functionality from the iPad. I was concerned about the size of the keys initially but after less than an hour of use I was able to go back to full-speed. The keyboard provides good protection for the screen obviating the need for a cover. The iPad can be slotted in either portrait or landscape and has a magnetic fitting keeping the keyboard connected even while walking around. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not good for IPAD -AIR, Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for my prior IPAD and it was really a great product. Ordered it for the AIR expecting same satisfaction. NOT CLOSE. As other reviews indicate, the cover does not close completely, and the keyboard lifts under strain of the IPAD weight when inserted in the slot. I sent it back. Logitech needs to take this product off market and reengineer.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely handy keyboard cover ... well designed!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard cover works great! We can prop up the iPad in either direction; makes the screen easy to read without expending energy to keep it propped up. Works really well as an iPad cover. Or, I can peel it off and just use the iPad by itself as a tablet. It's the best of all worlds, IMHO. I love the (approximately) 3-month battery charge for the keyboard. We're still on the first full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the older version of this keyboard purchased for ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the older version of this keyboard purchased for my iPad 2 a few years ago. However, this version here for the Ipad Air 2 is useless. The magnetic trough into which the iPad Air sits is too large and thus the iPad Air is NOT held securely. Also, the angle at which the iPad Air sits is too low, making visibility and use suboptimal. It appears that Logitech did not redesign this trough for the thinner iPad Air. Bottom line is that I have discarded this cover after just one day's use. The one silver lining is that I purchased instead the Shark iPad Air cover and love it even more than the original Logitech cover.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic hinge broke twice
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these back just after I got my iPad Air. It worked well, but the magnetic hinge broke about six weeks after I got it. I contacted Logitech, and they sent a replacement in relatively short order. The second one worked fine for several months, but its hinge also broke a few months back. Note that this was without a lot of heavy usage of the keyboard, or even using it as a cover; most of the time, my iPad sits on a different upright stand. Hard to recommend this device, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Yes I did like the keyboard for my iPad 2 better
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why people complain so. Yes I did like the keyboard for my iPad 2 better. Yes, I did like that it the iPad sat right inside it. Yes, I wish they had made this keyboard the same design, but they didnt. And, because some people like to complain I went through the process of trying other keyboards, returning them, and finally getting this one. I love it. It works just fine and like all other logitech keyboards it surpasses any other. If you like logitech keyboards you will love this one. And, yes it was used, and yes it was just like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and comfortable keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. It easily pairs by Bluetooth, and holds the iPad at a useful angle, whether the iPad is on my lap or on the table. The magnets generally hold the iPad in place well enough, though it is possible to knock the iPad out of the groove it fits into. The keys are well-spaced; not as compact as I might have feared, and have real travel and "clickability." I can type easily and quickly when I have more to write than I feel like picking out on the touchscreen. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Gerbil

customer_reviews.title: It will not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: The first keyboard from Amazon would not stay closed. Amazon quickly replaced the keyboard, and the second keyboard had exactly the same defect. I called Logitech twice, and they finally agreed to send me a replacement which I am still waiting for. What is really interesting is that Logitech told me that the keyboards from Amazon were not of the same quality if you buy directly from Logitech. Is that true? I will update when I get the Logitech direct keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Player

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard for the iPad Air!
customer_reviews.text: Got an iPad Air (not an Air2) to replace my old iPad 2. I'd had a Kensington keybaord for my older iPad which I liked somewhat for the older iPad2, but always felt it was a little clunky. This Logitech keyboard is a great match to the iPad Air and has a great feel to it. Sleep mode works as it should, and the magnets are just the right strength for the hinge as well as the support stand slot. Though I wouldn't use this as a carry case (I bought another smart cover for travel), for use and protection around the house, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rhody Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This Logitech keyboard is perfect for that task
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the iPad to consume media. I primarily use it for taking notes (Evernote). This Logitech keyboard is perfect for that task. Long battery life, solid typing experience. It has the same design aesthetic as the iPad. IMO, it's a really good choice. You do need to show some care to make sure you insert it correctly into the magnetic slot. If you put the iPad in "button-side down", it can fall out of the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half of the functionality you need or expect from this product...
customer_reviews.text: If you think this is a well designed product and accessory to your Ipad - think again. This is JUST a keyboard with a slot to put your iPad in and a pathetic little magnet to hold it on while it is shut. There is nothing holding the keyboard to the device when put away so you have no protection essentially for your screen without putting the combo in another sleeve or protective product. The ipad barely holds in the slot while you're typing and its even worse if you add a tempered glass screen protector. I have purchased other Logitech Ipad accessories and while the keyboard is a great feel, the overall product quality and design is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Prohaska

customer_reviews.title: All it's cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. I have something similar for my iPad 2 and I wouldn't live without a keyboard of this sort. It's lightweight, attractive, fast-connecting, and sturdy. Yes, the keyboard is smaller than the keyboard for my desktop; but of course! How else could it be so handy and lightweight if it were something other? Having to adapt to the difference is a very small price to pay for the convenience I enjoy from owning this keyboard. I would recommend it to anyone who uses his/her iPad Air 2 for more than just browsing the 'web or listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: Logitech has a history of great products. I have a 2 button Logitech ps/2 mouse from '95 that still works perfectly. This product however was a gigantic flop. When closed, the iPad easily comes slightly ajar from the case which unlocks the ipad thereby draining the battery for no good reason. When in use, the iPad is not held in place solidly. Touching the top of the screen feels extremely unstable, and in some cases, even topples the whole assembly backwards slightly. I don't have a perfect suggestion for an alternative, but my best advice is to keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Wunstel

customer_reviews.title: If you don't care about a perfect fit...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it has a nice feel to it. It's easy to type on and although it's smaller than a standard keyboard it seems to feel ok. The part that sucks (and is mentioned in other reviews), the iPad doesn't close all the way. It doesn't latch either. When carrying it around, I have to hold it shut the whole time. It's not the end of the world, but it is kind of annoying. Barely noticeable, but you can slightly feel it with your hand. Other than that, it works great. Connected in about 3 min.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha W.

customer_reviews.title: There is also a magnetic connection in the dock section which really makes for a comfortable fit when viewing the screen and typ
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding keyboard. The magnets on the end attach very snuggly, but not too much so. This allows me to use the keyboard as a cover when carrying my iPad. There is also a magnetic connection in the dock section which really makes for a comfortable fit when viewing the screen and typing. The "return" key is a little small, but also reasonably so considering the compact size of the keyboard. It may take a little getting used to for some. The other keys fall very much the like most other keyboards, and is very comfortable to use. Definitely recommend it. It is a great keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Mont

customer_reviews.title: Great with only one exception
customer_reviews.text: Pros: lightweight, solid closure, wake/sleep function, resposive keyboard, bluetooth connection automatic, ...almost perfect. Con: magnetic closure off about 1/4 inch. So when you close, the iPad overlaps. You can then align by force. Returned the first but second was the same. If a 1/4 doesn't bother you, an excellent option. Recommendation: get an armor shield of some type for the back of the iPad so it doesn't get scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Donbie

customer_reviews.title: Turns my iPad Air into a MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The magnet on the hinge is very strong clamps closed to make your iPad Air very similar to MacBook Air. I like the way it protects my iPad making the entire exterior a metal case. The bluetooth automatically connects to my iPad every time I open it. The keyboard has a bevel in it where the iPad rests at a perfect angle and the magnet is strong enough to allow you to pick up the entire thing by the iPad and the keyboard will stay attached. The price was a little high ($79), but I've definitely gotten my use out of it. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: lunchroom

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard. Check prices before buying
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard! Really added some ergonomic properties to my iPad Air. Long lasting battery and easy to carry around. The only downside is I wish the groove it sits in was adjustable. I was trying to use it when I watched the last 4 minutes of the Pats game and I had to take it off because it didn't sit up enough in my lap. Other than that it's a great product. Snaps on magnetically and holds very tight.
customer_reviews.author: devante franklin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This little keyboard is perfect for my work desktop to keep my iPad in a professional stand and ready at a moment's notice if I have to type an email or a doc. Can't remember when I charged it last and once I sync'd the bluetooth to my ipad air the connection has been flawless. I bought a sleve to keep the ipad and the keyboard safe when I travel. I bought "SimpleSleeve, Premium Neoprene Sleve" and both fit perfect and look professional. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Arrison IV

customer_reviews.title: One word: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard case is awesome. The keys are sturdy and I type just as fast as on a regular keyboard. The battery lasts a long time and it is easy to charge through a micro usb cable. The only downsides to this product, depending on what you want, is that it does not include a plugin charger and it does not protect the back of the ipad. I prefer minimal bulkiness on my products so I actually liked that it did not wrap around the back of the ipad. Other people might prefer a complete cover however.
customer_reviews.author: ModeratePol

customer_reviews.title: What happened to your quality, Logitech???/
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was very flimsy and appeared to be warped. It kept coming apart. Had to return it for a different brand. This was the first time ever that my Logitech product was inferior, and I have owned many!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth C. Heitin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful with only the slightest of issues.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Absolutely fabulous keyboard, sized great for people with large hand who know how to type. The built in magnetic stand is fantastic. You can however rotate your table 180 degrees and it will at least hold on to it, so you don't have to toss the keyboard aside. Cons: I really wish there was a tablet folded mode, but I knew there wasn't when I purchased it. Placing the tablet in a portrait manner in the groove is a little less firm, and contrary to the keyboard design, but works. Arc in keyboard/iPad prevents the tablet from locking sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: WingsOverEden

customer_reviews.title: The best keyboard!!!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing. The battery life is much longer than the IPads. I had this keyboard for my old larger IPad. When I was gifted a new Ipad I had to have this keyboard again.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Light. Smart. Practical
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Logitech clip on keyboard. I am a sales rep and I carry my iPad all day. It is literally the lightest one I could find. It look smart that even this has been out for years, people still stop me and ask about it. Only concern is that it does NOT work as a protective case for your iPad. You have to be careful and not drop your iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Love my keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love my keyboard. It made things a lot easier when I was traveling need to get work done. Typing up long documents and photo descriptions for clients was done faster and let me get back to my holidays quicker. The ipad was at a good angle and I was able to type as I normally would on my computer. Only downsides are it doesn't have a jacket so it gets scratched easily and while the angle is great for typing and using it the ipad as a computer, its not that great for watching movies when you're lying down. Still a good buy though!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H

customer_reviews.title: This one is super light weight
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a cheaper one - it was thicker, heavier, required raising a support to hold the iPad and remembering to put it down again not to break it. This one is super light weight, super thin, holds the iPad in either position by just slotting it in, is instantly recognized by the blue tooth. Anyone want to buy my old keyboard ?
customer_reviews.author: Irene K Adams

customer_reviews.title: Third time's a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd keyboard I've tried and finally got one I like. It's much lighter than the last one that I tried and I like the magnetic clasp. Keyboard works very well too and it sits at a good angle. It doesn't really offer protection for the ipad though so if that's what you're looking for, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: raindrop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPad keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard every day with my iPad Air II in graduate school and love it. The keys are a tiny bit smaller than regular keyboard keys, but my fingers adjusted very quickly. The keyboard is very responsive and accurate. It is lightweight and convenient to use. The charge lasts between a week and two weeks - I like how I can charge it quickly with a USB cable. All in all, great purchase, great keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian B

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected - do your research into this product before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife because her Belkin case was falling apart (a $100 disappointment). This is not a case, I discovered, but a "cover" that seconds as a keyboard. It works as expected, but there is no coverage for the device's back and protection is minimal, at best. If you buy this, don't expect protection, just expect a keyboard that sticks to your tablet. If that's good enough, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless keyboard at good price
customer_reviews.text: I loved my prior logitech ultrathin keyboard and it lasted several years. I like this version better because it has a rechargeable battery that lasts a long time between charges. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Overall this isn't a bad keyboard option for the iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Overall this isn't a bad keyboard option for the iPad Air 2. It's easy to set up, the keyboard has a nice quality to it, the battery life is very good, and it "just works." I do have some complaints though. 1. The angle at which the iPad sits is very shallow. I feel like the iPad is always pointing at the ceiling. 2. Because of the way the iPad "mounts" in the groove for reading, there is no palm rest. 3. When in storage mode, it doesn't really close, but it vaguely and weakly magnetically closes, but I found that the cover opens a little too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DeLena

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for iPad Air...
customer_reviews.text: I could not live without this keyboard. I use my iPad more like a laptop for work and personal use and this works great. I also like it for the fact that when I just want the iPad I don't have to remove it from a case. My ONE complaint/request, is that the groove where the iPad sits could be a bit more secure. Though I have NEVER had my iPad fall, it just doesn't feel very secure in the groove - especially in portrait mode. However, if you want a great keyboard that stays charged for months (literally) and is sleek, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy an iPad without this.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I am using the keyboard at this moment from a hotel room in Kentucky. It sure beats typing on the "glass screen!" I looked at a number of brands. Most have crappy keys. The Logitech keyboard was by far the best one I found although I have heard good things about Zagg keyboard but couldn't get my hands on one of those to try it. Having used the Logitech, I have no desire to try any others.
customer_reviews.author: Wi-Fi enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: efficient keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: replaced one that I had for a long time. light and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tony Moore

customer_reviews.title: These are super functional great for turning your iPad into nearly as ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of the Logitech ultrathin keyboard. This model was for the new iPad and I also have a model for the older iPad 2 iPad 3 etc. These are super functional great for turning your iPad into nearly as productive a device as a full computer great for working on the plane. It doesn't provide any protection for the back of the iPad that has not been an issue for me it does provide some protection for the screen but again it's not really the reason I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimdoesvoip

customer_reviews.title: It worked great but after a year fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard cover worked great for a year. Yesterday the magnet strip/hinge came apart while I was on an escalator. Probably lost one piece so I can't even try to fix. I bought it for $64, cost today is about $110. So I keep it together with the iPad with a large rubber band. Would have been 4 or 5 stars a few days ago. But with this quality, I'm generous with 2.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Mintchell

customer_reviews.title: Super Keyboard and Cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this keyboard/cover. It is nice to have a separate keyboard and nice to have the Ipad NOT locked into a keyboard. More versatile. My only complaint is that the keyboard is iOS 5 instead of 7, but that only affects the function keys. Also, be careful not to drop the keyboard on a hard surface (my floors are slate). I totally destroyed my first keyboard but replaced it with the same because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I almost didn't order one based on the negative reviews, I'm glad I took a chance. No complaints at all, the magnet is nice and strong and the keyboard works great. I've been using it pretty heavily for a few months now, both at work and at home. I just wish I hadn't shelled out for that expensive-but-useless leather case from Apple because it is now collecting dust in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: JDV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality keyboard and the magnets latch well with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality keyboard and the magnets latch well with the ipad. However, the viewing angles are bad. It offers only one angle which leans back much further than I prefer. It should be fine for use on a desk but not quite on couch/bed.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Has a few design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Most everything worked as per all the positive reviews, but the one thing I really didn't like was that the groove in which to seat the iPad is not secure enough. Doesn't work at all if you place the iPad vertically, and even in landscape direction it has a tendancy to fall off if you exert too much pressure interacting with the screen. Also, for some reason even when closed you can see it somehow triggers the iPad to turn on, so it doesn't really put it to sleep upon close.
customer_reviews.author: mruphd

customer_reviews.title: which makes typing extremely annoying. I've barely used it and it's already like ...
customer_reviews.text: After using the product for a little less than a month (in which i've probably used the keys less than 15 times), I've noticed a decrease in sensivity with the space key due to a gap opening between the base of the keyboard, which makes typing extremely annoying. I've barely used it and it's already like this, so I cannot even imagine how it would hold up for people who use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Chuong

customer_reviews.title: first one broke
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality of this keyboard. However, the first one I received broke fairly quickly. The movable arm that connects the keyboard ad iPad magnetically came loose. amazon quickly replace it, however I am noticing that the connectors seem weak on this one too. I am handling it more gingerly, when detaching the iPad from the magnetic piece, but I hope Logitech is working on a sturdier design.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bruce

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: We never could get this product to link with our iPad Air. We contacted Logitech several times over 4 weeks and never got a resolution to the problem. The company only responded with e-mail with a 2-3 day lag in between e-mails. Then they told us we needed to get another iPad to try with it. Out of frustration we gave up and returned the keyboard to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: sew lady

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered many different brand , but I come back to Logitech again. Keyboard is perfect for me. I have the Logitech case and keyboard fabric folio, but as like many consumers, corner get broken and Can't use. My ipad Air fits perfectly. Best full size keyboard that comfortable to use it. Very strong Magmatic....
customer_reviews.author: happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Great low-profile keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic keyboard. I had the same one for my iPad3. The magnet is stronger on this iPad Air version so it doesn't come apart in my briefcase as often as the iPad3 version did. The best feature of this keyboard is that it gives you an integrated keyboard without the bulk of the folio-type keyboards. This one fits easily in my purse and I never take the iPad without it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsy

customer_reviews.title: Keys stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Certain keys stopped working making it useless after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Makes my Ipad look more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using my keyboard right now and I absolutely LOVE it. I bought it used and it still came in great condition. I can tell when the battery is getting low because typing gets slower. Not a problem remembering to charge it. It clicks at the side and closes flush with my Ipad Air. The wedge you stick it in to hold your Ipad in is the perfect angle.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Great KB.
customer_reviews.text: It Works Awesomely, it turned my iPad 5 in to a mini Laptop. Only issue not all functions that you would find on a Mac Kb work.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Marrero

customer_reviews.title: I can say for certain that they fixed all issues and this keyboard is amazing. Literally can go an entire month without needing
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this in August of 2014. I read the previous reviews and it was plagued with "weak magnets" or doesn't fit right, etc. I can say for certain that they fixed all issues and this keyboard is amazing. Literally can go an entire month without needing to charge it. Magnets are strong and keep it in place and it fits beautifully over the Ipad. I haven't had any problems with it so far, but I can highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: mountainsarc

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Logitech keyboard cover and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My first keyboard cover for my iPad was the Logitech and I became a fan from day one. When i bought the iPad Air, I felt lost until I got the Ultrathin keyboard cover. I read some of the reviews and was surprised by negative comments. I ordered one anyway and glad I did. I'm not sure what people are expecting, but this keyboard case serves my needs by both protecting the iPad and serving as a very functional keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Moser

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice design and seems to be working good - week 1.
customer_reviews.text: This really is a nice design and I like the fact you can remove the cover/ keyboard totally when holding the iPad so you have no added weight. Easy to connect to iPad with Bluetooth by just going to settings and selecting the keyboard. Wish the document had come with the product and not had to download it myself. The cover is as hard as the back of the iPad so I feel it will protect it well.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have the Logitech Bluetooth keyboard cover for my iPad 2 and I loved it. So when I upgraded my iPad 2 to the iPad Air I have to get the same keyboard cover. I almost bought a different keyboard that was a case/keyboard, but I knew it would be too bulky for my purse. So I waited and found this keyboard on Amazon. It is the best if you need a thin keyboard without the protective case.
customer_reviews.author: KingCrossRd2010

customer_reviews.title: Smart cover(switching screnn on/off) doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The typing, battery and everything else works great. The magnet on the side is strong, the magnet to fix the ipad to the keyboard when typing is not as strong but okay to keep the ipad there and lift the keyboard up. However, the case I bought can't switch the screen on and off automatically. It's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Loved that I got it on sale too. Great and no problems syncing to iPad. Battery life is superb. Highly recommend over the others. I have tried other keyboards and have found this one to be one of the best. Really does streamline the iPad. However, I still recommend putting the iPad into a cover case because it can still scratch, as mine did. It's streamlined enough to fit into a fashion pouch. Otherwise, it still works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Momoflow, Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive; doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is fine but the magnetic cover does not work. My battery's drained to zero a few times when I thought the cover shut off the iPad. Upon close inspection it noticed you need to squeeze it to get it to shut off but when you let go, the iPad comes to life again with the cover closed. If this was a cheap cover I'd be fine with it but this cost quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: SaltyDog503

customer_reviews.title: Kind of like they were making it for an iPad and Android
customer_reviews.text: Not a well thought out product. Kind of like they were making it for an iPad and Android, it seems universal which means it works with everything, but doesn't work really well with anything. Just a cover, not a case. Bigger that it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: The Chip

customer_reviews.title: It works quite nicely. Typing is pleasant and it integrates well with ...
customer_reviews.text: It works quite nicely. Typing is pleasant and it integrates well with the iOS system. However I had to search in the internet how to insert special characters for writing in Portuguese (the manual was little to no help). I'm uncertain it will last much though and not being able to use the iPad in portrait mode is a disadvantage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent IPad Air Keyboard/Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Logitech Keyboard/Cover I have purchased for an IPad. The first was for an IPad2. My most recent purchase was for an IPad Air. It sets up easily in minutes and functions well as an attractive cover for the screen and an excellent keyboard for various typing functions such as email, social media and notes/documents.
customer_reviews.author: Concord Art

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, with squishy plastic sound on every touch
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous version for my iPad 4, and it was awesome. This is not so awesome. The magnets inside the groove are weak (no more reassuring *click*), and the plastic ridge that forms the groove detaches slightly when interacting with your Air. The result is a gross plastic squishy sound on every touch of the iPad. Portrait mode? I wouldn't risk it... This does not feel like a defective unit, it feels like it was rushed to market. =(
customer_reviews.author: graycode

customer_reviews.title: Works great for improving data entry and holding the iPad at ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for improving data entry and holding the iPad at a good display angle. Magnetic hinge design is the only weak point. It will eventually come apart as it did on our first one, but we like this enough to purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product. It does, however, take some getting used to the fact that there is only a "virtual" mouse. For sure, it makes sending lengthy email much easier. Ditto calendar entries. It isn't inexpensive, but it's well made and doesn't dramatically add to the weight of the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: RBK

customer_reviews.title: A little touchy and double-tappy.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a little touchy and sometimes double-taps on a key. I was hoping I could use it to "laptop-ize" my iPad Air and see if I can use it as a replacement for my laptop, especially when traveling. The verdict is still out on whether that will work, but I will revisit this with more information if I can.
customer_reviews.author: nobody_special

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. My previous Logitech keyboard for iPad was amazing. This one didn't connect correctly and just after 12 months stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy_H

customer_reviews.title: Failed after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Fiirst one ordered had the hinge break. ^^Logitech replaced it promptly without question. At about 5 months the on-off/open-close function quit. Now when you use a shift key (I'm typing this on screen) it inserts ^^ before the letter. Worked great when it worked and like the thin profile, but I think I'll be looking elsewhere now. Generally had good luck with Logitech products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Wirt

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST keyboard. It is even better than more expensive keyboards that I recently purchased and gave away. This is my third Logitech keyboard and I'll never change brands again. Key spacing is good and not overly sensitve like some other keyboards. Even the key size is finger perfect! You won't be disappointed with this excellent keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: World Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product!!! I had the keyboard they made for the original iPad and loved it. This one I have had for only two months and maybe used it 10 times and it is already coming apart. It is flimsy and doesn’t even close onto the iPad all the way. The corners on mine are coming apart. Looks elsewhere! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Taffe

customer_reviews.title: Best Keyboard Case I've tried
customer_reviews.text: It's by far, the best keyboard I've tried. The keyboard turns into a cover that is light-weight and protective. The only downside is that when the iPad is sitting up on the keyboard (like in picture), it's pretty easy to knock it over with anything more than a slight-tap on the iPad. One side of the iPad is magnetically attached to the case, which helps. Could be a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it, because there aren't any keyboard shortcuts. I understand sacrifices have to be made out of consideration of form factor, but that's just my preference. It's bulkier than i had hoped as well. I didn't want to ding it too badly because it seems like a quality build, and it works flawlessly, it's just not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: jaileer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! I actually received one as a Christmas present in 2013 and not six months later I poured hot chocolate all over it and it was ruined. The keys were stuck down and there was just no salvaging it. Thus, I purchased one for myself and have been just as pleased. As long as you keep liquids away from it, it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: iPad Transformer - A+++
customer_reviews.text: I spent some time trying to figure out WHICH keyboard cover would work with my new iPad Air and was slightly worried that I would end up purchasing the right one but HOORAY it's perfect! I had another older Ultrathin keyboard for my old iPad 2 and it truly transformed the way I used the iPad...so when hubby bought me a new iPad for my bday, I knew I wanted another keyboard. IF you don't already have one of these babies, get one - it really will transform your iPad from a gaming/reading machine to a workhorse. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MarylandMary

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this keyboard. The iPad Air sits in its slot quite nicely, and I appreciate that the keys on the Logitech keyboard make a seamless connection to each other as I type. I was having that issue with a previous plastic key keyboard hence my decision to purchase this one. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Charline Ratcliff, Author

customer_reviews.title: The iPad is simply held in place by a magnetic ...
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is simply held in place by a magnetic strip and then you have to lift it out and place it in the other magnetic groove to use it standing up. It's awkward and you have to handle the face of the iPad a lot, which keeps it covered in fingerprints and smudges. My advice is to pay a little more and get the folio version of this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ogg

customer_reviews.title: Works with iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would work with my iPad Air 2, and it did. It just leans back a little more than with the original iPad Air... which I see as a bonus feature.
customer_reviews.author: William Holtzinger

customer_reviews.title: This case is a PERFECT blend of functionality, weight and protection
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but the reason I bought an iPad and not a laptop was so that I wouldn't have to carry a brick around with me to do basic computing on the run. Why then would I buy a big heavy keyboard case? Kind of defeats the purpose. This case hardly adds any weight to your svelte little iPad!
customer_reviews.author: JBiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great keyboard for the ipad. Several members of my family have these and they continue to work well after a couple of years of steady use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic clip broke within 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Product bought late July 2016. The magnetic clip that hold the iPad has just broken. My last one for older iPad (different type) is still working. Not sure who to complain too. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AEF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GADGET for your iPad Air !
customer_reviews.text: Really a MUST ! With this keyboard... why will somebody buy a notebook for working or surfing ??? Easy to use, easy to config, really Light !!! Forget about typing problems. Goes great with the ipad, like born together! This really UPGRADES your ipad to almost a Notebook functionallity ! You wont regret !
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Great cover/keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I had a more expensive one that had a small plastic piece crack and wouldn't hold the ipad. I bought this and it is a fantastic cover. Incredibly easy to open and close and stays in place. The only thing I'm having to get used to is the location of the Caps Lock key as I keep putting my A finger there.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McKinzey

product_meta.title: Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard Cover For Ipad Air, Space Grey
product_meta.description: Colour Name:GrayGet the other half of your iPad with the Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard Cover for iPad Air. This special cover features a two-in-one design and offers the protection of a cover with the convenience of a built-in Bluetooth keyboard. The keyboard offers incredibly fast, fluid, and comfortable typing and even includes special shortcut keys for copy, paste, undo, and more. Plus, there's even a special slot so you can enjoy a comfortable view of your iPad while you type. When you're not using the keyboard, special magnets attach to your iPad and transform it into a cover, protecting your screen from damage. When used as a cover, it even utilizes sleep/wake functionality to wake your iPad up when you open the cover and puts it to sleep when you close it.
feature_bullets: Ultrathin Keyboard Cover for iPad Air (5th Generation): Built-in Bluetooth keyboard with full-size keys and iOS shortcuts for fast, fluid typing
Thin, light aluminum screen cover: Complements and protects your iPad in style
Powerful magnetic clips: The cover and iPad stay perfectly aligned and securely closed when you are on the go
Sturdy iPad stand: A magnetic groove holds iPad upright at the ideal angle for typing and interacting with the touch screen
Auto wake/sleep: Automatically wakes your iPad when you open the cover and puts it to sleep when closed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars428 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
